Your claim details have been entered into an automated baggage tracing system that will enable you to check the status of your baggage. urls.title: Report or check the status of mishandled baggage
urls.description: We apologise for the inconvenience of the mishandling of your baggage. Please be assured that we will do everything possible to assist you and resolve the situation. If you have submitted a claim, please click on ‘View/Update Status’ and enter your file reference number. Your claim details have been entered into an automated baggage tracing system that will enable you to check the status of your baggage. Please ensure that your name, address, flight information and bag type details are correct. In case

data.text: @shobhamalpani  Kindly note that, if you have not reported the missing baggage yet, please go to the following link, https://t.co/Ffso6mTeep and click on “Report mishandled baggage” to complete the details and report the delay or missing of your baggage.

urls.title: Track my bag
urls.description: We strive to ensure the safe and timely delivery of your baggage upon your arrival to your destination. You may track its status through any of the options below. Simply enter your bag tag number (assigned to you during check-in) or the booking reference number (the si x-digit alphanumeric code on your booking confirmation) and your last name in the fields below to follow your bag's journey.
